rows.label: qev086005_MSG0013
rows.name:
Looks like you haven't found those materials yet.
I guess some of 'em are pretty rare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086005_MSG0012
rows.name:
Energy tubes especially. You have to take on tough
hostiles like those pawn puges in the Seaswept Base
if you want to get your hands on one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086005_MSG0011
rows.name:
I think gathering them will be hard, but[ST:wide ]—
please, do your best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086005_MSG0001
rows.name:
As expected of Elma's team!
To think you really gathered all the materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086005_MSG0002
rows.name:
With this, we'll be able to produce
high-precision parts, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086005_MSG0003
rows.name:
Yes. From now on, we shouldn't need you
to go collect parts from wreckage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086005_MSG0005
rows.name:
Slowly but surely, we're building
a sustainable future for ourselves on this planet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086005_MSG0006
rows.name:
Lin, it's thanks to professionals
like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086005_MSG0007
rows.name:
And also, the native residents of Mira
who accepted us[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086005_MSG0009
rows.name:
Now then, next we have to save Tatsu's stomach.
As promised, I'll make you a feast![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086005_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yay, meh!
Lin-san, I love you, meh![ST:wait ]
